title: Why does Riot Games have so many staff
body:
I've been reading about Riot's woes with Tencent and how they need to cut back in order to not run at a deficit. 

Their esports department has been costing too much money so they're not going to send their broadcast team to Korea for worlds until the finals. 

Riot has 2500 employees. Why do they have so many people working there? They have only released one game and it doesn't take that much to maintain it, even if you count the esports aspect of it. 

Seems like a big waste
